title: The Perception of life
brief_description: A history of the microscope. Deals with the evolution of ideas about the smallest units of life and the relation between what a scientist sees and the theories he creates. It begins with the work of the early microscopist and ends with our current theories of DNA and viruses. Narrated by Stephen Toulmin.
